summary: A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.
cast: Elisha Cuthbert|Chad Michael Murray|Brian Van Holt|Paris Hilton|Jared Padalecki|Jon Abrahams|Robert Ri'chard|Dragicia Debert|Thomas Adamson|Murray Smith|Sam Harkess|Damon Herriman|Andy Anderson|Emma Lung|Kendal Rae
keywords: wax|group of friends|brother sister relationship|beaten to death|bra
title: La casa de cera
